column5: My home is a beautiful place to rest while you are away from home. It is within driving distance of many attractions...Downtown Dallas, Six Flags, Hurricane Harbor, AT&T Stadium, American Airlines Stadium & Joe Pool Lake Marina. Close by are many stores, shopping malls, restaurants, family-friendly activities, and night-life.   My home is great for couples, families (with kids), and big groups. Fully furnished house w/lots of comfortable areas to rest & hang out.
